mapper.select: SELECT m.DEPT_CODE, SUM(r.RV_VALUE) AS RV_VALUE FROM MEMBER m JOIN REVENUE r ON m.MEM_NO = r.MEM_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(r.RV_REGIST_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY') = #{year} AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(r.RV_REGIST_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM') = #{month} GROUP BY m.DEPT_CODE ORDER BY m.DEPT_CODE

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(rv_regist_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM') AS month, SUM(rv_value) AS rvValue FROM REVENUE WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(rv_regist_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY') = #{year} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(rv_regist_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(rv_regist_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM')
